name: Digital Data Engineer
description:
The digital data engineer will work within the marketing technology team. The Data Engineer will provide end-to-end assistance with data pipeline from MySQL to Google Big Query, while supporting and optimizing the Marketing Data Architecture construct. This includes ETL, designing & building data models, data validation, and managing uptime. You will work closely alongside teams within our Marketing and IT departments to best align support for Marketing

Some projects include:

  • Pipelines from our MySQL database to Google BigQuery
  • Airflow pipelines to several analytics and ad-network destinations
  • Maintenance of Google BigQuery
  • SQL reports in Metabase
  • Matching media spend to ROAS
  • GTM service side tracking and implementation

Data Engineer - Digital Marketing

  • Understanding the principles of organizing data warehouses, the principles of operation of columnar databases.
  • Working with data warehouse in designing data storage schemas.
  • Loading data from various sources (both internal databases and external analytical / marketing platforms, etc.) into data warehouse.
  • Automation of data-pipelines, ETL processes.
  • Search for errors and anomalies in data, automation of data quality check.
  • Preparing data marts.
  • Preparation and maintenance of the metadata catalog.
  • Organization of CI / CD and monitoring of data processing pipelines.

Requirements:

  • Great educational background, preferably in the fields of computer science or engineering
  • 3– 5 years of relevant experience data analysis experience from Financial industry
  • Previous experience working with digital marketing teams
  • Understanding the Forex market is an advantage.
  • Strong knowledge of SQL, ability to build complex queries and optimize performance.
  • Experience with Apache Airflow, Vertica, Google Cloud Platform.
  • Strong Knowledge of Python
  • Fluent in English
